value:
With all these hoity-toity royals and
Heroes around, this war must be
about to end...right?

Yeah, I joined the Deliverance 'cause
Forsyth invited me, but...I'm gettin'
tired of the whole war situation...$k$pWake me up when it's over... Deal?

If training's wearing you down...just
skip a few sessions! Ya gotta carve
out time for yourself once in a while.

Know a good place to catch a few
winks? Feel free to join me! Some
jobs are just made for ditchin'.

Huh? I wasn't up to anything. Just
starin' off into space... Do you...have
a problem with that?

Huh. Guess this place is about what
I imagined it'd be... Wait—you are
$Nu, aren't ya?

Nice one, Python! ...Yeah, I welcome
any and all praise. Even from myself!

Hmm... That felt, well...normal.
Nothin' wrong with normal, though!

Woof. That was...not great. Everyone
has off days, though, right?

Can't say I don't appreciate this, but...
what're you expectin' me to do with
this, exactly?

Hey! Name's Python. Uh...where are
we, anyway? And just so we're clear,
I ain't much for chores, all right?$k$pSo don't go gettin' any ideas...

Oh, it's you. Sorry if you expected
me to thank you for summoning me...
It's just I already had plenty to do.$k$pSeriously. Couldn't you have taken
care of all this yourself? You needed
MY help? C'mon—did ya even try?!$k$pWhatever. Too late now! Not sendin'
me back anytime soon, I imagine...
Fine. I'll do what needs doin'...$k$pBut AT LEAST tell me what's in it
for me... Bribery does wonders for
my motivation, y'know!$k$pBy the time I head back, I expect ya
to have a nice reward ready for ol'
Python. Better get started planning!
そらっ
はいよっと！
うわ…
痛いって…！
You've earned this.
Sorry, but it ends here!
Hah! You don't stand a chance!
Are you crying?
Seriously...?
Ha ha ha.
You been waiting for me? Name's Python. Guess we'll be workin' together.
Whaaat? What's your problem? Grow up already!
Nothing beats The Deliverance, but you guys aren't bad I guess...
Forsyth is nice enough, but man can he be a pain at times. If he starts talkin' your ear off...just walk away.
Smell that? It reeks of royalty in here...
You mean I stop everything I'm doing to come all the way to another world...and now I gotta WORK? Where did I go wrong...
Well, if you reeaaaally need it, I can help out. Unless I don't want to...then I won't.
Whatever you say...
Really?
Do I have to?
